headline: PulteGroup Announces Quarterly Cash Dividend of $0.22 Per Share
summary: ATLANTA, September 03, 2025--PulteGroup, Inc. (NYSE: PHM) announced today that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly dividend of $0.22 per common share payable October 2, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on September 16, 2025.

headline: NYSE Content Advisory: Pre-Market Update + Alphabet shares pop 7% to lift S&P 500
summary: The New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) provides a daily pre-market update directly from the NYSE Trading Floor. Access today's NYSE Pre-market update for market insights before trading begins.
